text: The canton of Montluçon-1 is an administrative division of the Allier department, in central France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Montluçon.Décret n° 2014-265 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de l'Allier It consists of the following communes: #Domérat #Montluçon (partly) #Saint-Victor #Vaux ==References== Category:Cantons of Allier
title: Canton of Montluçon-1
